definition: Luo Chengjiao (1931-1952), PRC hero of the volunteer army in Korea
to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: Eg. The Korean people set up a monument in memory of Comrade Luo Shengjiao.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮人民立了一個紀念碑紀念羅盛教同志。

sentences.english: The Korean people set up a monument in memory of Comrade Luo Shengjiao.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮人民立了一個紀念碑紀念羅盛教同志。

sentences.english: Luo Shengjiao took off his coat and jumped into the iced river.
sentences.chinese: 羅盛教脫下外套跳進了冰冷的水裏。

sentences.english: Luo Shengjiao gave his life to save a Korean child.
sentences.chinese: 羅盛教犧牲自己拯救朝鮮小孩。
